item.title: BTS' Jimin becomes the fastest K-Pop soloist to reach 1 BILLION streams in Spotify history.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘The Little Mermaid’ earns the 7th highest preview gross for a G-/PG-rated movie in history at the box office with $10.3 million earned on Thursday.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: “We as a society love to watch stuff to judge folks. I’ve always thought that the beginning of the downfall of society was with — what’s the name of that show?”
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Whoopi Goldberg says American Idol was the beginning of “the downfall of society.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
Celine Dion cancels all of her concerts scheduled through to spring 2024 due to an ongoing medical condition.
“I'm working really hard to build back my strength, but touring can be very difficult even when you're 100%.”
item.author: PopBase
